hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: What do you want to do when you've finished? pharmacistjobs.us In Qatar, however, you feel the mythic potency of the whole pearl phenomenon. Far from being a uniform silvery white, pearls come in just about every colour, size and shape: pink conch pearls from the Caribbean, black pearls from Tahiti, silvery violet pearls from the Peruvian rainbow-lipped oyster, brown pearls, red, green, even blue pearls; wing-shaped, pole-shaped, florid “baroque” pearls; enormous white pearls from the giant clam. There’s an obsessional culture surrounding these jewels of the sea going back millennia, embodying not only ancient trade routes, customs and beliefs, but all the follies and grandeurs of human civilisation, best represented in the history of the most famous and valuable of all pearls, la Peregrina, of which more later.
